law.catch_line: Restriction of use of early intervention funds - Maintenance of July 1, 1993 funding level.
law.text: The use of early intervention funds provided under KRS 200.650 to 200.676 shall not be used to supplant existing funds from other sources. All local and state programs for infants and toddlers with disabilities and their families shall maintain the funding which supported programs for infant and toddler and their families at levels as of July 1, 1993.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 313, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1994.
